subSubSection.paragraph: Otostigmus beroni Lewis, 2001: 22; Lewis 2010 : 26.
Material examined.

Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050101-Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050120: Jilong Town , Jilong (Gyirong) County , Xizang ( Tibet ), China , 28.4370째N , 85.2568째E , 5/8/2016 , leg. Zhiyong Di. Ar. -MHBU-SoJL21080101: Jilong Town , Jilong (Gyirong) County , Xizang ( Tibet ), China , 28.4350째N , 85.2570째E , 1/8/2021 , leg. Zhiyong Di. Housed in MHBU
.
Diagnosis.

caption.paragraph: Figure 1. Otostigmus (O.) beroni Lewis, 2001 A, B, G Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050101 C, D, F, H, I Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050104 E Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050105 A dorsal view B ventral view C cephalic plate, antennae, tergite 1 and legs 1-2, dorsal view D, E ventral view of head, basal antennal articles, an arrow showing the profile of the tooth plate F tergites 16-19 G sternites 11-14 H last two segments and ultimate legs, dorsal view I last two segments and ultimate legs, ventral view. Scale bars: 10.0 mm ( A, B ); 2.0 mm ( C, F-I ); 1.0 mm ( D, E ).

subSubSection.paragraph: Description

(Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050101). Length
: 54 mm (measured from anterior margin of cephalic plate to posterior margin of tergite 21).
Cephalic plate : wider than long, rounded anteriorly, without sutures or sulci (Fig. 1C ).
Antennae : 18 articles, basal 2.3 glabrous, the remainder are covered with short hairs (Fig. 1C, E ).
Forcipular segment : tooth plates with 4 teeth in each plate, the median 3 fused. Process of forcipular trochanteroprefemur with 3 teeth (Fig. 1D ).

Coxopleuron : with numerous small pores, coxopleural process moderately long and apical border with protuberance (Fig. 1I ). With pore-free longitudinal strips within pore field. Coxopleural process with 2 apical spines, 2 lateral spines, and 1-2 dorsal spines.
Legs (L) : L1-16 and L18-19 with 2 tarsal spurs, L1-4, left L5 and right L6 with 1 tibial spur and L1 with 1 femoral spur.
Variability.

caption.paragraph: Table 1. Variation in O. (O.) beroni from Jilong County, Xizang (1: Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050101; 2: Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050102; 3: Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050103; 4: Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050104; 5: Ar.-MHBU-SoJL1608050105) (L/R: Left/Right).

tr.td: Number of glabrous basal antennal articles
